Title: All the Way Boys
Writer: Giuseppe Colizzi (screenplay), Barbara Alberti (screenplay), Amedeo Pagani (screenplay), Gene Luotto (English dialogue)
Actors: Terence Hill, Bud Spencer, Reinhard Kolldehoff, Carlos Muñoz
Plot: A bush-flying duo crash-land in the heart of the Peruvian jungle where an unscrupulous speculator controls a precious emerald source and an entire mining community. Can they right the wrongs, and in the process, manage to make a profit?
